snippet: Their first Olympic run ends with a 1-4 record, but Nigeria’s basketball team vows the world has not heard the last from them.
abstract: Nigeria's men's basketball team ends its first Olympics appearance with a 1-4 record, but vows that the world has not heard the last from them.
lead_paragraph: Their first Olympic run ends with a 1-4 record, but Nigeria’s basketball team vows the world has not heard the last from them.

headline.seo: Bruised and Beaten, but Nigeria’s Basketball Players Are Unbowed
headline.main: Bruised and Beaten, but Nigerians Are Unbowed
headline.print_headline: Bruised and Beaten, but Nigerians Are Unbowed
